wantStartMissionPhrase.content: Okay, but I'm sorry to hear you go. Would you like to switch a different activity instead?

wantResetProgressPhrase.content: Are you sure you want to discontinue the game and lose all your progress and score?

wantExitPhrase.content: Are you done playing this game for today?

returnToGamePhrase.content: Are you ready to be returned to the game process?

repeatLastPhrase.content: I don't understand you. Please, repeat last command

exitAfterCancelPhrase.content: Alright, hope to see you again soon

exitPhrase.content: Alright, hope to see you again soon

wantMissionFromBeginningPhrase.content: Do you want to start mission from the beginning?

generalHelpPhrase.content: You are competing against your friend Ben. The game is played until 11 points. During each round, you will be playing one of 5 fun activities.

trySomethingElsePhrase.content: Would you like to try something else?

selectActivityBetweenTwoPhrase.content: Do you want to play Last Letter or Bam Wham?

selectActivityBetweenThreePhrase.content: Do you want to play Last Letter, Bam Wham or Alphabet Race?

selectActivityBetweenAllPhrase.content: Do you want to play Last Letter, Bam Wham or Something Else?

selectActivityBetweenOthersPhrase.content: Do you want to play Alphabet Race or Rhyme Match?

wantRestartPhrase.content: Would you like to try another game?

helpRepeatPlay.content: Would you like me to repeat that?

fireworksWhistles.content: What a great idea, Ben. Here we go.
